attributes.action: David Cameron to debate Nigel Farage on the eu referendum live on television
attributes.background: Nigel Farage has challenged David Cameron to a live tv debate on the eu referendum, let's make sure he doesn't hide from it

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It would be up to television companies to arrange a debate and to invite people to attend.
